scripts.start: concurrently "npm run sass:watch" "npm run sass:build && snowpack dev"
scripts.build: npm run sass:build && snowpack build && npm run extensionfiles:copy
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && web-ext build -s build --overwrite-dest
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run sass:watch" "npm run build && web-ext run -s build"
